pullrequest.title: Update transport integration test, and fix the transport library.

content.raw:
The [transport coverage analysis is not that bad](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-quantal-amd64/32/clover-report/_var_lib_jenkins_workspace_gazebo-any-coverage-quantal-amd64_gazebo_gazebo_transport.html) but I would like to improve a couple of zeros. First one about [not testing a method in Iface](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-quantal-amd64/32/clover-report/_var_lib_jenkins_workspace_gazebo-any-coverage-quantal-amd64_gazebo_gazebo_transport/TransportIface_hh.html#120) and the second is about the whole class [Publication_transport](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-quantal-amd64/32/clover-report/_var_lib_jenkins_workspace_gazebo-any-coverage-quantal-amd64_gazebo_gazebo_transport/PublicationTransport_cc.html).

I've fixed first one in bcecd76 branch ```gz_tool_part1_extra_tests```. I also wrote the skeleton for PublicationTransport but I would need some help about what is the best way of creating a ConnectionPtr for testing init() method.
content.html:
The transport coverage analysis is not that bad but I would like to improve a couple of zeros. First one about not testing a method in Iface and the second is about the whole class Publication_transport.

I've fixed first one in bcecd76 branch gz_tool_part1_extra_tests. I also wrote the skeleton for PublicationTransport but I would need some help about what is the best way of creating a ConnectionPtr for testing init() method.
